div.p: This code system https://ibsi.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ defines the following codes:

tr.td: Volume density - oriented minimum bounding box
Area density - oriented minimum bounding box
Volume density - minimum volume enclosing ellipsoid
Area density - minimum volume enclosing ellipsoid
Intensity histogram robust mean absolute deviation
Intensity histogram quartile coefficient of dispersion
Volume fraction difference between intensity fractions
Intensity fraction difference between volume fractions
Grey level run length based features
Short run low grey level emphasis
Short run high grey level emphasis
Long run low grey level emphasis
Long run high grey level emphasis
Grey level size zone based features
Small zone low grey level emphasis
Small zone high grey level emphasis
Large zone low grey level emphasis
Large zone high grey level emphasis
Grey level distance zone based features
Small distance low grey level emphasis
Small distance high grey level emphasis
Large distance low grey level emphasis
Large distance high grey level emphasis
Neighbourhood grey tone difference based features
Neighbouring grey level dependence based features
Low dependence low grey level emphasis
Low dependence high grey level emphasis
High dependence low grey level emphasis
High dependence high grey level emphasis
feature computed per slice, and averaged over slices
feature computed from 2D directional matrix and averaged over 2D directions and slices
feature computed from a single matrix after merging 2D directional matrices per slice, and averaged over slices
feature computed from a single matrix after merging all 2D directional matrices
feature computed from 3D directional matrix and averaged over 3D directions
feature computed from a single matrix after merging all 3D directional matrices
feature computed from 2D matrix and averaged over slices
feature computed from a single matrix after merging all 2D matrices
align grid centers interpolation grid dimensions
feature computed from a single matrix after merging 2D directional matrices per direction, and averaged over directions
Aggregating intensities from a response map
modulus, magnitude or absolute response map
angle, phase or argument response map
Intensity rounding: Describe how fractional Hounsfield Units are rounded to integer values after interpolation
Discretisation method: Describe the method used to discretise image intensities
Discretisation method: Describe the number of bins (FBN) or the bin size (FBS) used for discretisation
Discretisation method: Describe the lowest intensity in the first bin for FBS discretisation
Software availability: Describe which software and version was used to compute image biomarkers
Texture matrix aggregation: Define how texture-matrix based biomarkers were computed from underlying texture matrices
Distance weighting: Describe which software and version was used to compute image biomarkers
